title: Poached eggs
description: Three minutes to cook, a lifetime to master - the poached egg makes a great breakfast or welcome addition to a light supper.

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Fill a small pan just over one third full with cold water and bring it to the boil.
Add the vinegar and turn down to simmer.
Crack the eggs one at a time into a small bowl and gently tip into the simmering water.
Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen towels.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve immediately.
